attributes.action: give more support to small village pubs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: small village locals need the Government to understand that if help is not given to these pubs many,many more will close with the loss of hundreds of jobs and the loss of revenue such as rates, beer duty etc., community life. Our trade has been the hardest hit, year after year with the smoking ban and heavy increases in beer duty its time we were given a break for once.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
